name: Portonazo
description:
You are the new member of a local gang in where you will have to rise in ranks while you face different gangs in their respective neighborhoods, until we manage to find those who murdered your older brother. It's a 3rd person beat em up video game for 2 players, with simple melee combat, where weapons, items and teamwork will be crucial in battles in an exciting, linear and staged revenge story

Game made by "Victor Rosas" and "Sebastián Toledo" for the Andrés Bello University.

 Victor Rosas: Programming AI, Programming Player interactions, Level Design, UI/UX, Modelling. 

Sebastián Toledo: Programming Player movement, Level Design, Music, SFX, Art.
